旤字的基本解释

旤
huò
古同“祸”。

旤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huò］
(1)遇到可怕事情发出的惊呼声。
(2)“禍”的古字。

旤字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【无字部】　旤； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页485第35
【玉篇】同?。【前漢·五行志】數其旤福。【註】旤，古禍字。　又【韻補】叶後五切。【前漢·敘傳】致死爲福，每生爲旤。叶上社，社音土。

旤字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huò]
(1) The exclamation of encountering terrible things.
(2) The ancient word "misfortune".
Scoff
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【No Words Department】　旤; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 485 No. 35
[Jade articles] The same?. [Former Han·Five Elements] Count the blessings. [Note] Shut, the word for ancient disasters.　【Rhyme Filling】Five cuts at the back of the leaf. [Previous Han·Xu Chuan] Death is a blessing, and every life is a scoff. Ye Shangshe, sheyin soil.
